And just now,
Glenn said he suddenly had a craving for yuzu juice.

His friends were still getting texts from him!
How mysterious...

There's something mystical about this place,
Just wandering around here,
(Thinking) I find myself pondering the ultimate answer to the universe.

A once-famous gem collector
went missing during a collection trip.
Many people know about this, but what they don't know is...
This way I can listen to the fountain's melodious pitter-patter while enjoying a morning coffee with friends. (Like)

Perfume may have different effects,
depending on the weather.
So, I choose which perfume to wear based on the weather.

The other day, they were discussing what else could be added to the plaza.
If I had to choose,
(thinking) I'd love to see some coffee tables, chairs, and a small fountain.
